title: Advertising
image_desc: A colorful billboard with a catchy slogan and a product image.
content: - Advertising is a form of communication used to persuade an audience to take a particular action.
It can be used to promote products, services, ideas, or even people.
Advertising can be found in many different forms, including television, radio, print, online, and mobile.
narration: Advertising is all around us! It's how companies try to get our attention and convince us to buy their products or services. Think about the commercials you see on TV, the ads you hear on the radio, or the banners you see online. They're all examples of advertising.
